attrs.script:
#script
"""
This script is used to create protection domain in nutanix cluster and 
it will add vms to protection domain
Usage:
Edit the script and input PE details, protection name and vm uuid.
python Create_PD.py 
Devops can modify this, as per their convenience
"""


PE_IP = "10.46.34.87"
Username = "admin"
Password = "Nutanix123#"

PD_Name = "jwt"
VM_UUIDS = "73d1596e-9354-476c-8acb-08281ae8cd7d,644ee04e-47c8-4fbc-baf0-425fc08f0238"

headers = {'Content-type': 'application/json','Accept': 'application/json'}

def create_pd(PD_Name, PE_IP, Username, Password, headers):
  PD_Payload = {"annotations": ["string"],"value": PD_Name}
  response = urlreq('https://%s:9440/api/nutanix/v2.0/protection_domains/' %(PE_IP), verb='POST', params=json.dumps(PD_Payload), auth='BASIC', user=Username, passwd=Password, headers=headers, verify=False)
  Create_PD_Reponse= response.text
  print("The response is:%s"%Create_PD_Reponse)
  return Create_PD_Reponse


def add_vms_pd(VM_UUIDS, PE_IP, PD_Name, Username, Password, headers):
  VM_list = []
  VM_list = VM_UUIDS.split(',')
  for VM in VM_list:
    VM_Payload = {"ids": [VM]} 
    response = urlreq('https://%s:9440/api/nutanix/v2.0/protection_domains/%s/protect_vms' %(PE_IP, PD_Name), verb='POST', params=json.dumps(VM_Payload), auth='BASIC', user=Username, passwd=Password,  headers=headers, verify=False)
    Add_vms_PD_Response=response.text 
    print("The response is:%s"%Add_vms_PD_Response)
  return Add_vms_PD_Response

createpd = create_pd(PD_Name, PE_IP, Username, Password, headers)
add_vm = add_vms_pd(VM_UUIDS, PE_IP, PD_Name, Username, Password, headers)

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall
